description: A well in a crystallization plate
title: PlateWell

rowNumber.description: <The row number of this well. This is 1-based, so row A is 1, row H is 8. This should be validated against the plateType's rows property.

columnNumber.description: <The column number of this well. This is 1-based, so should match the column labels on the plate. This should be validated against the plateType's columns property.

name.description: A human-friendly well identifier. If present, this should be validated to ensure that it refers to the correct row and column.
